overview: Derrick Dime's married life keeps getting more complicated as it seems everyone wants a piece. As his brother-in-law, Quentin Gainz, approaches the house, he notices Derrick on the porch with the air conditioner repair guy. It's obvious that Derrick is interested in guys, but Quentin also has his sister to look out for. So Quentin makes a proposal: he'll take care of his needs from now on, if Derrick agrees to cut out the other guys. When freshmen Bridger Watts and Rod Peterson receive invitations to pledge for the coolest fraternity on campus, they're stoked! Frat chairmen Markie More and Derrick Dime show them what really goes on behind the closed Greek Row doors. Things have been a little tense around the house since Addison seduced his step-brother Markie a few weeks ago. As Addison comes into the bathroom to brush his teeth (while Markie is showering), he cracks the shower door and steals a look at Addison's sweet ass as he begins to stroke his cock.
title: Brothers Without Rubbers
